THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Visual reinforcement: The thumbnail directly supports the provocative and instructive title ('If You're Not Doing This with WD-40 You're Stupid') by showing an actual can of WD-40 in use and highlighting an unrevealed 'secret' area with an arrow. The focus on the product and the word 'Secret' triggers curiosity and aligns with the promise of the title.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Contrasts or mismatches: No major contrasts. However, while the title is more aggressively worded ('You're Stupid'), the thumbnail avoids harsh language in text, opting to tease a secret instead. This softens the tone visually while still encouraging a click.
